title: myTVS forays into EV mobility service, to add 10k electric 2-wheelers to fleet by March 2025
description: Digital automotive aftermarket platform myTVS will add 10,000 electric two-wheelers to its fleet by March next year for its new Mobility-as-a-Service venture. Partnering with MoEVing, the company aims to provide end-to-end vehicle management solutions. TVS Vehicle Mobility will invest up to Rs 150 crore for this acquisition.
